thread.title: Ethan Hawke to run NYC Marathon with wife for charity
thread.title_full: Ethan Hawke to run NYC Marathon with wife for charity

title: Ethan Hawke to run NYC Marathon with wife for charity
text:
Ethan Hawke to run NYC Marathon with wife for charity Ethan Hawke to run NYC Marathon with wife for charity Share 
Ethan Hawke is to run his first marathon to raise money for charity. 
The Boyhood star said he and his wife Ryan will take part in the New York City Marathon on November 1 to support The Doe Fund, which works to break the cycle of homelessness, addiction and criminal recidivism. Ethan and Ryan Hawke (Jordan Strauss/Invision) 
It will be the first 26.2-mile race for the couple. Share article 
The Academy Award-nominated actor said: “Ryan and I are both feeling daunted and terrified,” but “are of course excited, too”. Promoted Stories
